articles.title: Every Game Pass game with awkward achievement values - TrueAchievements

articles.content:
• Sunset Overdrive88 Achievements worth 5,743 TA (1,925 GS)
  • DOOM Eternal50 Achievements worth 4,001 TA (1,545 GS)
  • No Man's Sky27 Achievements worth 3,008 TA (1,000 GS)
